body:
## Release Notes

- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#126)
- Adopt new name for error enum in NGC. @iphydf (#125)
- Update group private message API function. @iphydf (#124)
- Add more tests for bootstrap. @iphydf (#122)
- Add ubsan to the asan build. @iphydf (#120)
- Run all tests under asan. @iphydf (#119)
- Add tests for all options setters/getters. @iphydf (#117)
- Add conference_send_message test. @iphydf (#114)
- Add coverage check to the docker build. @iphydf (#112)
- Add test for conference invites. @iphydf (#110)
- Add tests for name, status, status message callbacks. @iphydf (#108)
- Add support for groups, conferences, messages. @iphydf (#103)
- Add cython-lint and make it happy. @iphydf (#101)
- Add stubgen to produce typings for cython modules. @iphydf (#97)
- Add explicit return types in tests. @iphydf (#96)
- Use apigen to generate cython. @iphydf (#88)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#87)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#86)
- Re-enable layering_check now that rules_python supports it. @iphydf (#85)
- Upgrade to latest cython version (3.0.2). @iphydf (#84)
- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#56)
- Add support for toxcore built with autotools. @iphydf (#54)
- Rename package in preparation for release on PyPi. @iphydf (#55)
- Use rules_cc instead of native cc_library rules. @iphydf (#51)
- Fix warning about empty statements (";") after macro calls. @iphydf (#50)
- Migrate to Camel_Case enum types. @iphydf (#49)
- Use python3 for bazel builds. @iphydf (#48)
- Run Travis CI against newer Python versions @robinlinden (#47)
- Fix minversion typo in tox.ini @robinlinden (#44)
- Format yaml files according to yamllint's requirements. @iphydf (#42)
- Add conference_get_id function @tox-user (#36)
- Update Dockerfile from ubuntu 14.04 to 16.04. @iphydf (#43)
- Avoid LAN discovery in python tests. @iphydf (#40)
- Don't use a linker script on OSX. @iphydf (#39)
- Add a clang-analyze job to the travis build. @iphydf (#37)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#38)
- Add circleci build using ASAN. @iphydf (#35)
- Add badge of shame for coverage. @iphydf (#34)
- Only run coverage on one of the many builds. @iphydf (#33)
- Start measuring test coverage on pytox. @iphydf (#31)
- Update copyright notice. @iphydf (#29)
- Fix buffer overrun caused by missing NUL terminator. @iphydf (#28)
- Prepare for 0.2.0 release. @iphydf (#26)
- Adopt new conference peer nick/list_changed callbacks. @iphydf (#24)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#23)
- Adapt py-toxcore-c to new conferences state change callback. @iphydf (#22)
- Test building pytox with docker on travis. @iphydf (#21)
- Avoid clashes with "build" directories on case-insensitive file systems. @iphydf (#20)
- Update to split bit_rate_set functions. @iphydf (#19)
- Fix bootstrap host name. @iphydf (#17)
- Use tox_options setters instead of the struct members directly. @iphydf (#18)
- Merge upstream @iphydf (#16)
- Support one-big-lib version of toxcore. @iphydf (#15)
- Use https for downloading opus. @iphydf (#13)
- Use markdown license for GPLv3. @iphydf (#11)
- Don't use `git.depth=1` anymore. @iphydf (#10)
- Only fetch 1 revision from git during Travis builds. @iphydf (#9)
- Remove a.out after checking whether linking with toxav works. @iphydf (#8)
- Merge upstream @iphydf (#7)
- Update to new way of registering the log callback. @iphydf (#6)
- add lost method group_peernumber_is_ours @iphydf (#5)
- Enable debugging in toxcore during travis tests. @iphydf (#4)

## Features

- Add a simple groupbot. @iphydf (#127)

## Bug Fixes

- bug fix of examples/echo.py: AttributeError: local_discovery_enabled,on_audio_bit_rate,onâ€¦ @r0ad2k (#64)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Use latest instead of versioned toktok-stack image. @iphydf (#76)
- Set up CI using GitHub Actions @robinlinden (#71)
- Use toktok-stack 0.0.23 for cirrus builds. @iphydf (#68)
- Add cirrus-ci build. @iphydf (#66)
- Use a working bootstrap node in pytox examples. @iphydf (#58)
- Disable branch builds; only build tags and nightly builds. @iphydf (#61)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Fix invalid function pointer cast. @iphydf (#70)

## Maintenance (Refactoring)

- Better plugin management in groupbot. @iphydf (#128)
- Rewrite pytox using Cython. @iphydf (#73)
- Sourcery refactored master branch @[sourcery-ai[bot]](https://github.com/apps/sourcery-ai) (#59)

## Maintenance (Code style)

- Restyle all code in py-toxcore-c. @iphydf (#63)
name: v0.1.0
